title: Apron
description: waistband decorated with large band of embroidery showing geometric patterns in fuchsia, green, orange and purple; main body of black fabric decorated with three embroidered bands and ribbons forming a squared \'U\' shape; large central band shows fuchsia flowers on blue ground
creditline: The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund and Gift of funds from Thirza Cleveland and Joan Wurtele
